tool_description: Empower your crypto trading strategy with CryptoPairTrader. Utilize cointegration and Z-score analysis on dydx V3 to identify optimal pairs for pair trading.
name: CryptoPairTrader
title: CryptoPairTrader

api_list.name: Cointegrated Pairs on dYdX V3
api_list.description: This endpoint delivers essential metrics for pair trading strategy enthusiasts. Gain access to crucial data including cointegrated base ticker, quote ticker, Z-score, half-life, hedge ratio, and p-value. Make informed decisions and optimize your cryptocurrency trading strategy on dydx V3 with this comprehensive information at your disposal.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptopairtrader.p.rapidapi.com/dydxV3/cointegrated-pairs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptopairtrader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptopairtrader.p.rapidapi.com/dydxV3/cointegrated-pairs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptopairtrader.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
